kick_open_door.name: Kick Open Door
kick_open_door.description: With a mighty kick, you forcefully shove the door open, creating a dramatic entrance as it swings wide. The sound echoes throughout the tavern, drawing the attention of everyone inside.

creative_action_q.name: Bardic Performance
creative_action_q.description: You decide to showcase your talents and entertain the tavern crowd with a mesmerizing Bardic Performance. As you start to sing and play your instrument, the atmosphere in the tavern changes, and everyone's attention is drawn to you. Your enchanting performance captivates the audience, filling the room with joy and excitement.

effects.gain_reputation: The crowd is impressed by your performance, and your reputation as a talented bard increases.
effects.add_gold: As the patrons enjoy your music, they generously tip you, adding to your gold reserves.
